title: FS/FT: 1890 Mayo Cut N310 Ed Smith
author: kamikidEFFL

posts.post_title: FS/FT: 1890 Mayo Cut N310 Ed Smith
posts.post_content:
Hey guys got this 1890 Mayo Cut N310 Ed Smith SGC 30 for sale or for trade. I am willing to part with the card for $35 or will trade for any low graded 19th century stuff you my have. Some of my interests are N184 Kimballs, N28, N29. I am open to offers for trades as well though so feel free to throw something I may be able to use it towards a deal.

[IMG]http://sterlingsportsauctions.com/ItemImages/000020/20746a_lg.jpeg[/IMG]
Will take $30 shipped for the card
